name: Foxwood
description:
Foxwood is a Survival RPG that revolves around farming and building up your own world from the bottom up. A perfect civilisation between foxes and farmers. But one day....that all changed....

Foxwood has questing, farming, combat..and best of all, Fox companions. Build your dream farm, protect it, and thrive across the world.

Game Design and Programming done by myself.

All 3D Models used are from the Unity Asset Store.

This project is to add to my portfolio and is in no way commercial to make any money.
